name: SONIC 2: Speed Duel | 1 Zone Demo
description:
Welcome to Sonic 2 Speed Duel's 1 level demo!

- Run through a small rendition of Emerald Hill Zone from Sonic 2 and do your best to finish as fast as possible!

- Beautiful graphics from the classic games converted and edited to fit a new, simpler, but easy to use game engine!

- Recognizable gimmicks that make the levels a breeze to run through

- Starposts that indicate a warp to the next scene!

- Rockin' tunes and dynamic sound effects that come out of that old Mega Drive System

(Note: Keep in mind this is a small demo made by one person in his spare time with a deadline imposed, so any mistakes may be small oversights (although extensive playtesting has been done!))

ARE YOU UP 2 IT!?
